abstract: For those wondering why Toyota Motor continues to advertise during the current crisis over its reputation, a coming study suggests that such a course of action could be superior to inaction.
snippet: For those wondering why Toyota Motor continues to advertise during the current crisis over its reputation, a coming study suggests that such a course of action could be superior to inaction.
lead_paragraph: For those wondering why Toyota Motor continues to advertise during the current crisis over its reputation, a coming study suggests that such a course of action could be superior to inaction.

headline.main: Staying the Course Makes Sense for Marketers During Crises, Study Concludes

abstract: The automaker has told dealers to provide replacement pedals only if customers’ cars have already been repaired, and the owners have asked for them.
snippet: The automaker has told dealers to provide replacement pedals only if customers’ cars have already been repaired, and the owners have asked for them.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — After reports of sudden unintended acceleration in cars it has already fixed, Toyota has told dealers to provide replacement accelerator pedals to owners unhappy with repairs, a company document showed on Monday.

headline.main: Toyota to Replace Accelerator Pedals for Owners Who Are Unhappy With Repairs
headline.print_headline: Toyota to Replace Accelerator Pedals for Owners Who Are Unhappy With Repairs

byline.original: By Micheline Maynard and Nick Bunkley
